00018 // Initialization

00020 /**
00021  * \brief sets the menu up when it's opened (initialization)
00022  */
00023 CMenuGalaxy::CMenuGalaxy( char menu_mode, CExeFile &ExeFile, CSavedGame &SavedGame,
00024    stOption *pOption, bool &restartVideo ) :
00025 CMenu( menu_mode, ExeFile, SavedGame, pOption, DLG_THEME_GALAXY, restartVideo),
00026 processPtr(&CMenuGalaxy::processMainMenu),
00027 m_TitleBmp(*g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("MAINMENULABEL"))
00028 {
00029  // Perform coordinate calculations
00030  m_title_coord.x = (g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution().w - m_TitleBmp.getWidth())/2-48;
00031  m_title_coord.y = 48;
00032  init(MAIN);
00033 }
00034 
00035 bool CMenuGalaxy::init( menutypes menu_type )
00036 {
00037  cleanup();
00038 
00039  CFont &Font = g_pGfxEngine->getFont(1);
00040  Font.setBGColour(g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface->format, 0x545454);
00041 
00042  CMenu::init(menu_type);
00043 
00044  switch(m_menu_type)
00045  {
00046  case MAIN:
00047   initMainMenu(); processPtr = &CMenuGalaxy::processMainMenu; break;
00048  default:
00049   processPtr = NULL;
00050   break;
00051  }
00052  return true;
00053 }
00054 
00055 ///
00056 // Processes
00057 ///
00058 /**
00059  * \brief This cycle is processed every LPS. It's the menu core process
00060  */
00061 void CMenuGalaxy::process()
00062 {
00063  // Process the Menu Type logic.
00064  CMenu::process();
00065 
00066  if(processPtr != NULL)
00067   (this->*processPtr)();
00068 }

00070 /**
00071  * \brief This draws the upper part of the galaxy menu border
00072  */
00073 void CMenuGalaxy::drawMenuBorder()
00074 {
00075  SDL_Rect rect;
00076  rect.x = m_title_coord.x-2; rect.w = 155;
00077  rect.y = m_title_coord.y+7; rect.h = 1;
00078 
00079  // This one draws a line behind the bitmap
00080  SDL_FillRect(g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface, &rect, 0x54fc54);
00081 
00082  // And this the bitmap itself
00083  m_TitleBmp.draw(g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface, m_title_coord.x, m_title_coord.y);
00084 
00085  // This one draws a line at the down part
00086  rect.y = m_title_coord.y+90;
00087  SDL_FillRect(g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface, &rect, 0x54fc54);
00088 
00089  // TODO: Missing the guide text here!
00090 }
00091 
00092 /**
00093  * \brief This is the child process only for the main menu itself
00094  */
00095 void CMenuGalaxy::processMainMenu()
00096 {
00097  drawMenuBorder();
00098 
00099  if( m_selection != -1)
00100  {
00101   if( m_menu_mode == PASSIVE )
00102   {
00103    if( m_selection == 5 ) // Back to Demo
00104     m_demoback = true;
00105 
00106    else if( m_selection == 6 ) // Choose Game
00107     m_choosegame = true;
00108   }
00109   else if( m_menu_mode == ACTIVE )
00110   {
00111    if( m_selection == 5 ) // Back to Game
00112     m_mustclose = true;
00113   }
00114  }
00115 
00116  if( m_selection == 3 ) // Show Highscores
00117  {
00118   // TODO: Code here will a special case and must be done!
00119  }
00120 }
